mapper.select: SELECT a.STSFDG_NO, a.NTT_ID, a.BBS_ID, a.WRTER_ID, a.WRTER_NM, a.PASSWORD, a.STSFDG_CN, a.STSFDG, a.USE_AT, TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, b.USER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM FROM COMTNSTSFDG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.BBS_ID = #{bbsId} AND a.NTT_ID = #{nttId} AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ASC LIMIT #{subRecordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{subFirstIndex}
SELECT COUNT(STSFDG_NO) FROM COMTNSTSFDG WHERE BBS_ID = #{bbsId} AND NTT_ID = #{nttId} AND USE_AT = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNSTSFDG (STSFDG_NO, NTT_ID, BBS_ID, WRTER_ID, WRTER_NM, PASSWORD, STSFDG_CN, STSFDG, USE_AT, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ) VALUES ( CAST(#{stsfdgNo} AS NUMERIC), #{nttId}, #{bbsId}, #{wrterId}, #{wrterNm}, #{stsfdgPassword}, #{stsfdgCn}, #{stsfdg}, 'Y', #{frstRegisterId}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNSTSFDG SET USE_AT = 'N' WHERE STSFDG_NO = CAST(#{stsfdgNo} AS NUMERIC)
mapper.select: SELECT a.STSFDG_NO, a.NTT_ID, a.BBS_ID, a.WRTER_ID, a.WRTER_NM, a.PASSWORD, a.STSFDG_CN, a.STSFDG, a.USE_AT, TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, b.USER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM FROM COMTNSTSFDG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.STSFDG_NO = CAST(#{stsfdgNo} AS NUMERIC)
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNSTSFDG SET WRTER_NM = #{wrterNm}, PASSWORD = #{stsfdgPassword}, STSFDG_CN = #{stsfdgCn}, STSFDG = #{stsfdg}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = NOW() WHERE STSFDG_NO = CAST(#{stsfdgNo} AS NUMERIC)
mapper.select: SELECT PASSWORD FROM COMTNSTSFDG WHERE STSFDG_NO = #{stsfdgNo}
SELECT COALESCE(AVG(STSFDG), 0) FROM COMTNSTSFDG WHERE BBS_ID = #{bbsId} AND NTT_ID = #{nttId} AND USE_AT = 'Y'
